text: Dixy is the trade name of a well known chain of stores in Russia; a top retailer of food and general household merchandise. It may also refer to: == Businesses with the name == * Dixy Chicken, an English fast food chain, founded in 1986, with outlets across the United Kingdom that specialize in preparing and serving halal chicken == People with the name == * Dixy Ann Hepburn, Miss International 1971 contestant from Trinidad and Tobago * Dixy Lee Ray (1914–1994), American scientist and politician who served as the 17th Governor of Washington == See also == * Dixi (disambiguation) * Dixie (disambiguation) * Dixy, a surname
title: Dixy (disambiguation)
